[ti:i n t e r l u d e (Explicit)]
[ar:J. Cole]
[al:i n t e r l u d e (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]i n t e r l u d e (Explicit) - J. Cole
[00:00.70]Lyrics by：J. Cole
[00:01.40]Composed by：J. Cole
[00:02.11]I'm a livin' little good thing
[00:03.58]
[00:05.74]It's like you never lived for me
[00:07.46]
[00:09.15]Mama said you was a good thing uh
[00:10.64]
[00:13.13]Good good good
[00:14.43]
[00:17.45]Yeah
[00:18.05]
[00:20.63]We came a long way man we done came a long way
[00:23.58]
[00:26.52]And we sittin' on top of this s**t
[00:27.86]
[00:30.83]This s**t can go one or two ways
[00:32.27]
[00:34.34]This s**t can go up it can go down
[00:37.35]
[00:39.39]Either way n***a I'm prepared
[00:40.59]
[00:42.05]Feel me
[00:42.47]
[00:43.69]Yeah
[00:44.03]
[00:44.95]I be comin' in peace but f**k me
[00:46.71]Best beware of the others
[00:47.67]This s**t deep undercovers creep
[00:49.51]This Southern heat make unbearable summers
[00:51.39]Just last week seen your mama weep
[00:53.19]Crying 'cause she don't wan' bury your brother
[00:54.91]The blood leaks while the EMTs
[00:56.73]Gotta carry her baby like surrogate mothers
[00:58.71]Woah thank God we survived around where the terrorists hovered
[01:02.12]Though traumatized wouldn't trade it for nothin'
[01:03.97]Through hard times it was there I discovered a hustle
[01:06.36]And makin' the best out the struggle
[01:07.61]I kept grindin' 'til this day up a level
[01:09.50]Respect mine gotta stay out of trouble
[01:11.18]'Cause TEC-9's like the AR rebuttals
[01:13.16]Cole World n***as knowin' what it is
[01:15.13]Just in case they don't I show 'em what it is
[01:16.93]Then in summer I do real numbers
[01:18.38]Couldn't dare touch it if they sold the double disc
[01:20.57]Block hot n***as burnin' up the street
[01:22.29]Shots poppin' and we heard it up the street
[01:24.13]It's a war n***as runnin' up the score
[01:25.90]Jesus said that you should turn the other cheek
[01:27.67]Voiceless n***as gettin' murdered every week
[01:29.58]Dead bodies smell the odor in the street
[01:31.29]My homie' homie got out on parole
[01:32.89]He sold more Coca-Cola than the soda industry
[01:34.97]Summertime bring the coldest winter breeze
[01:36.81]Hella blues like the Rollin' 60's
[01:38.72]Christ went to Heaven aged thirty-three
[01:40.41]And so did Pimp C and so did Nipsey
[01:42.27]
[01:47.06]I told you I told you
[01:50.15]
[01:52.34]This s**t can go up it can go down I don't give a f**k
[01:55.11]N***a I done seen the highest heights
[01:56.63]
[01:58.54]I done seen it twice
[01:59.49]
[02:00.87]And I've seen them lowest of the lows
[02:02.55]
[02:03.82]And still I rose
[02:05.04]
[02:07.86]Now I'm at your neck n***a yeah
data.trans:
[ti:i n t e r l u d e (Explicit)]
[ar:J. Cole]
[al:i n t e r l u d e (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.70]//
[00:01.40]//
[00:02.11]我是个活生生的好人
[00:03.58]
[00:05.74]看起来似乎你从来没有为我活过
[00:07.46]
[00:09.15]妈妈说你以前是个好人
[00:10.64]
[00:13.13]很好 很好 很好
[00:14.43]
[00:17.45]//
[00:18.05]
[00:20.63]我们走过漫漫长路 伙计 我们走过一条漫漫长路
[00:23.58]
[00:26.52]我们位居金字塔的顶端
[00:27.86]
[00:30.83]这会闹上一到两天
[00:32.27]
[00:34.34]这结果可能是好也可能是坏
[00:37.35]
[00:39.39]无论最后怎样 我都做好了准备
[00:40.59]
[00:42.05]感觉到我的心情了吗
[00:42.47]
[00:43.69]//
[00:44.03]
[00:44.95]我来到这里并不想惹事 但是来招惹我
[00:46.71]最好小心我身边的人
[00:47.67]这偷偷埋伏着的阴险小人 
[00:49.51]南部一点就燃的气氛 让夏天变得难以忍受
[00:51.39]就在上周 看见你的母亲在擦眼泪
[00:53.19]泪流满面 因为她不想埋葬你的兄弟
[00:54.91]急救人员到来时已是血流如注
[00:56.73]必须想法设法拯救她的孩子
[00:58.71]感谢上帝 我们在恐怖分子聚集之地得以保全性命
[01:02.12]虽然遍体鳞伤 可我也不会让自己白白受伤
[01:03.97]虽然经历过一段艰难日子 可我发现了努力的方向
[01:06.36]在挣扎之后做到了完美的成绩
[01:07.61]我没有停止过努力 直到今天 飞黄腾达
[01:09.50]尊重我的人 别去招惹麻烦
[01:11.18]因为暴力只能换来暴力
[01:13.16]Cole的世界 那些家伙知道这代表什么
[01:15.13]以防他们还不了解 我会让他们看清
[01:16.93]然后到了夏天 我会做真实的自己
[01:18.38]如果他们卖得是非法的东西 我没有勇气去沾染 
[01:20.57]街区战火连天 那些家伙在街头争个不停
[01:22.29]连发的枪声 我们在那里听见
[01:24.13]这是一场战争 他们一心追逐战绩
[01:25.90]上帝说过 你应该宽容大度
[01:27.67]每一周都有无法发声的人惨遭谋害
[01:29.58]横尸遍地 闻着街头的恶臭
[01:31.29]我的兄弟 我的兄弟从监狱被放了出来
[01:32.89]他卖的那种东西 比汽水行业销量更大
[01:34.97]夏日吹起最刺骨的寒风
[01:36.81]跟Rollin' 60's帮派一样成群结队
[01:38.72]基督在三十三岁时去往了天堂
[01:40.41]Pimp C和Nipsey也跟他一样
[01:42.27]
[01:47.06]我告诉过你了 我告诉过你了
[01:50.15]
[01:52.34]这结果可能是好也可能是坏 我并不在意
[01:55.11]伙计 我见过最顶端的风景
[01:56.63]
[01:58.54]我见过两次
[01:59.49]
[02:00.87]我也见过最恶劣的地狱
[02:02.55]
[02:03.82]我仍然在向上攀登
[02:05.04]
[02:07.86]现在我已经掐住了你的脖颈 伙计
